(for 6 persons)For the choux pastry:- 25 cl water- 200 g flour- 100 g butter- 4 eggs- 1 pinch of saltFor the chocolate cream:- 3 egg yolks- 90 g sugar- 50 g flour- 50 cl milk- 100 g dark or milk chocolate- 1 pinch of saltFor the butter cream:- 1 egg yolk- 60 g sugar- 60 g butterFor the chocolate ice cream:- 100 g dark chocolate- 2 tbsp milk- 15 g powdered sugarFor the choux pastry:- 1 cup water
